sources.title: The Underground World (1943)
sources.description: Superman has to save Lois Lane from a cult of hawk-people in an homage to Edgar Rice Burroughs's "At the Earth's Core". Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-underground-world-1943/

metadata.Plot: The original discoverer's son takes Clark Kent and Lois exploring in unknown regions of Henderson Caverns. Henderson and Lois enter an underground world of hawk-men who have deadly plans for them.
metadata.Director: Seymour Kneitel, Dave Fleischer, Nick Tafuri
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Jay Morton
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Julian Noa
